subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Even in a sport that prides itself on nuance, the pitcher’s mound is easily overlooked. Is it hard or soft? Sturdy or crumbling? Steep or flat? To the untrained eye, it is hard to tell.
snippet: Even in a sport that prides itself on nuance, the pitcher’s mound is easily overlooked. Is it hard or soft? Sturdy or crumbling? Steep or flat? To the untrained eye, it is hard to tell.
